abstract.t: The distributed security framework document describes an approach where hosts take greater responsibility for protecting against attacks on security vulnerabilities targeted at themselves. This memo analyzes the threat model of the distributed security approach, in particular pointing out areas which the mechanism cannot protect against. Without that context, it's fairly hard to understand what you're trying to accomplish."
